CustomField.formula: OR ( AND ( ISPICKVAL(Account.PO_Required_for_Orders__c, "PO Required After"), Account.PO_Required_on_Line_Item__c = false, NOT(ISBLANK(PoNumber)) ), AND ( ISPICKVAL(Account.PO_Required_for_Orders__c, "PO Required After"), Account.PO_Required_on_Line_Item__c, Number_of_Order_Products_without_PO__c = 0 ) )
CustomField.label: Is PO Provided by Customer (After)
